name: MoorlFormsClassic

infos.name: Formular Baukasten 2 | Classic Add-On
infos.description:
Plugin Dokumenation

https://docs.moori.net/plugin/MoorlFormsClassic/
infos.shortDescription: Mit diesem Add-On für Formular Baukasten 2 stehen dir neue Möglichkeiten zur Verfügung. Repeater-Elemente, Kopie an Kunden senden, Newsletter Anmeldung anbieten uvm.
infos.highlights: Das Classic Add-On stellt 12 nützliche Features für den Formular Baukasten 2 bereit...
infos.features:
Element vom Typ "Mehrfachauswahl-Slider mit Bildern"
Element vom Typ "Einfachauswahl-Slider mit Bildern"
Element vom Typ "Repeater"
Element vom Typ "Digitale Unterschrift"
Element vom Typ "Steuer-ID inkl. Abgleich mit EU-Datenbank"
Element vom Typ "Bewertung mit Sternen"

Formular Aktion "Verlauf speichern"
Formular Aktion "Versandbestätigung ausdrucken"
Formular Aktion "Kopie an den Kunden senden"
Formular Aktion "Newsletter Anmeldung anbieten"

Interaktive Formulare: Einblenden / Ausblenden von Teilen anhand der Eingaben des Kunden

Formulare können sich die Eingaben des Kunden merken, auch nachdem man die Browser-Sitzung beendet hat

infos.name: Form Builder 2 | Classic Add-On
infos.description:
Plugin documentation

https://docs.moori.net/en/plugin/MoorlFormsClassic/
infos.installationManual:
You can find more information here:

https://docs.moori.net/en/MoorlFormsClassic/
infos.shortDescription: With this add-on for Form Builder 2, you have new options at your disposal. Repeater elements, send copy to customers, offer newsletter registration and much more.
infos.highlights: The Classic Add-On provides 12 useful features for the Form Builder 2...
infos.features:
Element of the type "Multiple selection slider with images"
Element of the type "Single selection slider with images"
Element of the type "Repeater"
Element of the type "Digital signature"
Element of the type "Tax ID incl. comparison with EU database"
Element of the type "Rating with stars"

Form Action "Save History"
Form Action "Print Dispatch Confirmation"
Form Action "Send copy to customer"
Form Action "Offer Newsletter Subscription"

Interactive forms: Show / hide parts based on the customer's input

Forms can remember the customer's input even after the browser session has ended

label: Formular Baukasten 2 | Classic Add-On
installationManual:
Weitere Infos findest du hier:

https://docs.moori.net/MoorlFormsClassic/

changelog.text: • Automatically set fields are no longer overwritten (readonly, disabled and hidden)
• Further adjustments for Shopware 6.5
• Customizations for Shopware 6.5
• Error in the validation fixed
• Bugfix for forms with selection fields within a repeater
• Small bug fix for the duration of ICS attachments
• Generated ICS files for calendar functions
• Ignores a possible misconfiguration during validation
• Options from single select fields can now have conditions
• New fields for IBAN and BIC incl. validation

• Save in history optional
  • Print view for a sent form optional
• New selection slider with images
• Acknowledgement of receipt for printing

• Logs all form data in a history table
  • This table can be exported as CSV
• Added conditions for options in radio and checkbox lists
• Caching of form data for better usability
• Configurable redirects
• Fixed faulty server side validation of "Contains" condition
• Added customer group and customer order numbers for selection field
• Signature field for form builder 2
• Version for the store release
